Signature Spamming that is detrimental to the discussions in threads will not count as payment. If you're reported or caught for spamming you'll be removed from this campaign after 2 strike. 3. If you have negative trust on level 2 default settings, you aren't allowed to participate in this campaign, and further more if you achieve negative trust on level 2 while you are in this campaign, you will be terminated, denied payment and removed from the campaign.4. 15 Posts min per week to be eligible for payment/ 60 posts max per week to be paid for (More will count as 60). Burst posting isn't allowed (spread your posting between the weekdays).5. Bonus pay only apply up to 15 posts per week in the Altcoin Discussion Boards. 6. Constructive Posts, 150 characters minimum, and quality ranking will occur base upon the quality of your posting, and the better you post the higher the tier you may achieve, users can be promote or demote base upon the quality of their posting. Local board posters are welcomed. 7. Spam such as referrals. Doesn't count towards your eligible payment posts.8. Payments are sent on Monday, Posts are counted Sunday 12:00 PM to Sunday 11:59 AM. All posts made after Sunday 11:59 AM accounts for the next week payment. We're using forum time so don't miscalculate. 9.
